name: It goes on (Small Flowers)
description:
Art and music my Greenpixel he has a website (https://sites.google.com/view/greenpixel16/home) scripting and else by Nibroc10 (http://covidgame.org/covidgame1.75/) and SmallFlowers (lonely)

Its just a game where you go up and then down :)

AD to move, space to jump, Esc to leave

the game is very wall jump centered later on so watch out for that

the music and art done by greenpixel are maybe the only good parts of it so maybe just play for that plz

if you dont care much about spectacular gameplay it can be pretty fun (or so ive been told)
